text:
The Hourglass Coven is a group of three powerful [[fey]] who take the form of [[hag]]s, each one bound to an aspect of time: one reflects the past, another reflects the present, and the third reflects the future. These hags are utter wickedness distilled into corporeal forms, driven by a lust for secrets that can be used to manipulate their prey.

The hags loathe each otherâ€™s company, but one hag will occasionally visit another to plot against the third sister, creating a vicious circle in which
[[Bavlorna|Bavlorna Blightstraw]] and [[Endelyn|Endelyn Moongrave]] plot against [[Skabatha|Skabatha Nightshade]], Endelyn and Skabatha conspire against Bavlorna, and Skabatha and Bavlorna bedevil Endelyn. Nothing much ever comes of these petty plots and squabbles, however.

While not as powerful as the [[archfey]], these three [[fey]] are still quite formidable. They are echoes of stories told in [[Eberron]] in which the past, present, and future make themselves known in fearsome ways. The most popular such story in [[Khorvaire]] is //The Carol of the Miser//, in which wraiths of the past, present, and future appear to a penny-pinching financier on the night before [[Boldrei's Feast]], showing him the ways in which his greed destroys those he loves and will eventually destroy himself if he does not repent.

The rise of the [[Daughters of Sora Kell]] may be amplifying the power of the Hourglass Coven by virtue of the Coven's parallels with these infamous mortal [[hag]]s. The three crones of the Coven may well be elevated to the status of [[archfey]] if their stories continue to spread.

!! Members of the Hourglass Coven

* The Past: [[Skabatha Nightshade]]
* The Present: [[Bavlorna Blightstraw]]
* The Future: [[Endelyn Moongrave]]
